title: Lovely 1 Bedroom Apartment! Waiting for You to Call it Your Home!
posting_body: When you live at Napa Green Apartments, you know you have arrived!
You will enjoy the convenience of community living in a peaceful and tranquil environment surrounded by nature!
You are in the middle of central downtown Napa and close to Napa Wine County.
If you enjoy taking a drive surrounded by award winning vineyards, wineries or taking a trip to Calistoga or Yountville for a day of shopping and dining, it’s all just miles away.
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $500 pet deposit per animal.
There is a weight limit of 35lbs per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Check out our virtual tour on our website at <URL>
Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
